effect.en: Your opponent may draw 2 cards. Either way, you may draw 2 cards.
Search your deck for a card named Gyarados, Dark Gyarados, or Shining Gyarados. Show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

description.en: An underpowered, pathetic Pok√©mon. It may jump high on rare occasions, but never more than seven feet.
